name: Top.io
description:
Get ready and choose your favorite spinner! The battle is on and it's tougher than ever. Drag your favorite spinner to knock down all the other spinners off the stadium. Coz, the last one standing wins the match. Can you survive until the end?

With every kill, get stronger and bigger. Use your skills, bait, push, kill and do anything to survive. Victory is everything.

How To Play: Swipe Your Finger to move the spinner and hit other spinners to push them out of the arena. Throw em all! The last one remaining will win the battle.
